Ocala.Paddock Mall:
Paddock Mall is an enclosed shopping mall in Ocala, Florida. Opened in 1973, it features Belk, J. C. Penney, Macy's, and Sears as its anchor stores.


== History ==
The first plan for Paddock Mall was made in 1973 by local developers, who sold the land to Edward J. DeBartolo Corporation.
